title: Bloomberg Markets: Levin Discusses Software in the Classroom
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Levin Discusses Software in the Classroom
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David S Levin CEO Mcgraw-Hill Education Discussing how technology is reinventing education, including the use of artificial intelligence to connect students and teachers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
